Students: Ph.D.: Matthew Fox (CU physics; co-advised with Manny Knill; 2024 - Present) Peter Ly (2024 - Present) Evelyn Warton (OSU; co-advised with Amir Nayyeri; 2022 - Present) M.S.: Kaung Myat Htay Win (2023 - 2024) Willow Barkan (co-advised with Amir Nayyeri; 2022 - 2023) Undergraduate: Adithya Bhaskara (co-advised with Raf Frongillo; 2025 - present) Ian Tassin (senior honors thesis; 2021 - 2023) Ryan Little (2021 - 2022) Andrew Hwi Gue Cho (2018) About In my spare time I enjoy running, mountaineering, and skiing. Additionally, I enjoy reading and playing Go. I am originally from the bustling metropolis of Hygiene, CO, which was named for the sanitarium that it once housed, and which is now most famous as the home of Apple the Cow. My full first name, Huxley, is actually an English last name.
